game:blockdesc-torch-crude-Lit-*: A crudely made torch that burns for up to 30 real-time minutes.
game:blockdesc-torch-crude-unlit-*: A freshly (and crudely) made torch that burns for up to 30 real-time minutes.
game:blockdesc-torch-crude-extinct-*: A crudely made, extinguished torch that burns for up to 30 real-time minutes.
game:blockdesc-torch-crude-burnedout-*: A crudely made, burned out torch that will no longer light.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-lit-*: A simple torch that burns for up to 2 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-unlit-*: A freshly made, simple torch that burns for up to 2 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-extinct-*: A simple, extinguished torch that burns for up to 2 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-burnedout-*: A simple, burned out torch that will no longer light.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-lit-up: A simple torch that burns for up to 2 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-unlit-up: A freshly made, simple torch that burns for up to 2 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-extinct-up: A simple, extinguished torch that burns for up to 2 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-basic-burnedout-up: A simple, burned out torch that will no longer light.
game:blockdesc-torch-cloth-lit-*: A long-lasting torch that burns for up to 4 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-cloth-unlit-*: A freshly made, long-lasting torch that burns for up to 4 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-cloth-extinct-*: A long-lasting, extinguished torch that burns for up to 4 real-time hours.
game:blockdesc-torch-cloth-burnedout-*: A long-lasting, burned out torch that will no longer light.
blockdesc-oillamp2-lit-*: An oil lamp that burns for up to 4 in-game days. Can be refueled with Animal Fat.
blockdesc-oillamp2-unlit-*: A freshly-made oil lamp that burns for up to 4 in-game days. Can be refueled with Animal Fat.
blockdesc-oillamp2-extinct-*: An extinguished oil lamp that burns for up to 4 in-game days. Can be refueled with Animal Fat.
blockdesc-oillamp2-burnedout-*: A burned out oil lamp that has run out of fuel. Can be refueled with Animal Fat.
